name: European Biostimulants Industry Council
goal: The European Biostimulants Industry Council (EBIC) promotes the contribution of plant biostimulants to make agriculture more sustainable and resilient and in doing so promotes the growth and development of the European Biostimulant Industry. EBIC was founded in June 2011 as the European Biostimulant Industry Consortium and changed its named when it gained legal identity in 2013.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Circular economy

Bioeconomy

Fertilising Products Regulation

Europe 2020 strategy

Horizon 2020

Green Deal

Fram to Fork
